root.name: Crime City
root.description: You play as Mr White a poor directive story writer who dreams of becoming a real Private Investigator. When a mysterious blonde walks into your office and tells you her father has been arrested for murder, you get the chance to become a real P.I.Crime City is a point and click adventure with a interesting twist. You need money to travel from place to place, to get information and for training. What better way than making money on the stock market.
